        Description copied from class: AKIBrain

      • setMove

        protected void setMove(Move move)
        Sets a move for the random KI, it auto chooses a random position. In case a thieve is around (==> its position is in showthieves), it autochooses this station
        Specified by:
        setMove in class AKIBrain
        Parameters:
        move - Move of a figure

      • checkPolice

        private java.lang.String checkPolice()
        Helper method for setMove, basically it checks for thieves. This can only happen if showthieves isnt empty If it is empty, it chooses a random value to move to
        Returns:
        returns the Stationname

      • checkOther

        private java.lang.String checkOther()
        Helper method for setMove, basically it deletes all stations which have cops on it and then choses a random value from the rest. If the thief is surrounded by cops, it just uses a random value for movement
        Returns:
        returns the Stationname

      • processEvent

        public void processEvent(IAEvent e)
        Processes Event Data, so it can set moves at the right time and get all needed data from the event object
        Specified by:
        processEvent in class AKIBrain
        Parameters:
        e - A event

      • stopComputing
